pkgmetadata.longdescription: Composite Spectra Analysis (CSA) for High-Resolution Mass Spectrometry Analyses // A fragmentation spectra detection pipeline for high-throughput LC/HRMS data processing using peaklists generated by the 'IDSL.IPA' package. The 'IDSL.CSA' package can deconvolute fragmentation spectra from Composite Spectra Analysis (CSA), Data Dependent Acquisition (DDA) analysis, and various Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) methods such as MS^E, All-Ion Fragmentation (AIF) and SWATH analysis.
